description: Non Material Amendment to Planning Permission 19/01980/FUL (Demolition of existing buildings and redevelopment of site to provide nine new dwellinghouses with associated boundary treatment, amenity space, refuse stores and cycle provisions along with associated parking), Condition 4 (Materials, colour and texture of external finish) for rewording to allow commencement of development prior to confirming full details of materials, colour and texture of external finishes of the buildings
decision_conditions: Full details of the materials, colour and texture of the external finish of the building shall be submitted to and approved in writing by the Local Planning Authority before proceeding past the Damp Proof Course (DPC) construction stage and the development shall be constructed in accordance with the approved finishes.Reason: To ensure a satisfactory appearance on completion of the development in accordance with Policy DM10 (Design Requirements for New Developments including House Extensions) of the LDF Core Strategy Adopted April 2012.
Condition 4 (Detailed Drawings) -Officers have reviewed the information submitted and are satisfied this can now be approved.
The submitted site plan has an incorrect scale bar, it measures to 100m instead of 50m in 1:500 scale as stated, please revise the proposed site plan with a correct scale bar.
